title: Apple TV+ comedy Trying returns July 22 for season three
content:
Apple TV+’s first British series production, the comedy series Trying, returns for season three on July 22, the company announced today.

more…

The post Apple TV+ comedy Trying returns July 22 for season three appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV+’s first British series production, the comedy series Trying, returns for season three on July 22, the company announced today. ‘Trying’ centers on the couple Nikki and Jason as they work their way through the adoption process. Esther Smith and Rafe Spall star. The show is written and produced by Andy Wolton, through BBC […]
